overview.summary: ExtractIsosurface extracts an isopotential surface from a scalar field.

net.title: ExtractIsosurface-list Regression Test
net.p: Test the ExtractIsosurface module by creating a list of values to isocontour on the boundary of the sphere-voltage test model.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/Visualization/ExtractIsosurface-list.net.

net.title: ExtractIsosurface-mcmp Regression Test
net.p: Test the Field output of the ExtractIsosurface module in multiprocessor marching cubes mode. This network demonstrates that the code which does the join for the different parts leaves a seam on the output field where the points are duplicated and thus breaks subsequent FieldBoundary and similar computations. The lines across the middle of the sphere reflect the places where the data was cut up and assigned to different processors.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/Visualization/ExtractIsosurface-mcmp.net.

net.title: ExtractIsosurface-probe Regression Test
net.p: Test useage of the Probe module to dynamically select which isovalue to use in the IsoSurface module. The widget can be moved around and the isovalue will cut through that point.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/Visualization/ExtractIsosurface-probe.net.

net.title: ExtractIsosurface-quantity Regression Test
net.p: Test the 'Quantity' method of selecting isovalues in the ExtractIsosurface module. The boundary of the sphere-voltage model is isocontoured at 10 evenly spaced intervals and the result is then displayed.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/Visualization/ExtractIsosurface-quantity.net.

net.title: ExtractIsosurface-slider Regression Test
net.p: Test the 'Slider' method of selecting an isovalue in the IssSurface module. The slider is used to select the value for an isocontour on the boundary of the sphere-volume data set.
This network can be found at src/nets/Modules/Visualization/ExtractIsosurface-slider.net.
